text: Marla Maples (born October 27, 1963 near Dalton, Georgia) is an American movie actress and television personality.The New York Times She is best known for her marriage to the businessman and President Donald Trump. She is a distant cousin of the actress Heather Locklear. She was born in Cohutta, Georgia. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:American movie actors Category:Trump family
title: Marla Maples
